alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 1:48AM CST until November 30 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Northeastern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... Northern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 230 AM CST. * At 148 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chatom, Tibbie, Millry, State Line, Buckatunna and Fruitdale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
